structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
PUBLIC WORKS IN CITIES OTHER THAN THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 114, effective January 1, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 39. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Power of city to acquire and operate garbage disposal system -- Acquisition of existing system.
